data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ma, Huiqin, Pei, Sujian, Hou, Xiaojie, Zhu, Tiegang (2014): Lithobius (Monotarsobius) zhangi sp. n., a new species from Eastern China (Chilopoda, Lithobiomorpha, Lithobiidae). ZooKeys 459: 1-10, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.459.8169, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.459.8169
